title: Sri Lanka Electricity Amendment Bill passed in parliament
body_lines: The third reading of Sri Lanka Electricity (Amendment) Bill, to provide for the regulations of the generation, transmission, distribution, supply and use of electricity in the country, was passed in the parliament today.
The House passed the Bill without committee state amendments, with a majority of 70 votes.
A total of 116 lawmakers had voted in favour of the proposed amendments while 46 voted against.
